original_title: 4周年記念 逢花が好きだ 山岸逢花と新婚同棲生活 朝起きたら隣に逢花がいて一緒に散歩して笑い合ってお風呂入ってセックスしまくる何気ない日常とピュアで淫らな記録
overview: Everyday life is ordinary, but when I spend those days with Aika, I come to like her even more. When I wake up in the morning, Aika is next to me, and we take walks together, eat together, take baths together, and laugh together. Her smile is irresistible even through the mask! Such a daily routine and a lascivious record of SEX every day. Lovey-dovey creampie, POV sex, jumping pranks in the park, embarrassed masturbation appreciation, slutty sex. Fourth anniversary. Aika and newlywed cohabitation life.
title: 4th Anniversary – We Love Aika – Living The Newlywed Lifestyle With Aika Yamagishi – When You Wake Up In The Morning, Aika Is Right Beside You, Smiling, Strolling, Laughing, Bathing, And Of Course, Making Love In This Pure But Sensual Footage
